title: User Management
description: Manage and monitor all users in your application.

invite.title: Invite User
invite.description: Send an invitation email to a new user

create.title: Create New User
create.description: Create a new user with email and password

actions.passwordsReset: Successfully sent password reset emails to {{count}} users

confirmations.deleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the user account and all associated data. Are you sure you want to delete {{email}}?
confirmations.banDescription: This will prevent the user from accessing the system. They will receive an error when trying to log in.
confirmations.resetDescription: This will send a password reset email to the user. They will be asked to create a new password.
confirmations.resettingUser: You are about to reset the password for {{email}}
confirmations.unbanDescription: This will allow the user to access the system again.
confirmations.batchDeleteDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete {{count}} user accounts and all associated data.
confirmations.batchDeletingUsers: You are about to delete {{count}} users
confirmations.batchBanDescription: This will prevent {{count}} users from accessing the system. They will receive an error when trying to log in.
confirmations.batchBanningUsers: You are about to ban {{count}} users
confirmations.batchUnbanDescription: This will allow {{count}} users to access the system again.
confirmations.batchResetDescription: This will send password reset emails to {{count}} users. They will be asked to create new passwords.
confirmations.batchResettingUsers: You are about to reset passwords for {{count}} users
confirmations.sendMagicLinkDescription: This will send a magic link to {{email}} for passwordless login.
confirmations.magicLinkTypeDescription: Choose the type of magic link to send.
confirmations.removeMfaDescription: This will remove the {{factorType}} MFA factor from {{email}}. The user will lose this two-factor authentication method.
confirmations.makeAdminDescription: This will grant admin access to {{email}}. The user will be able to access the admin panel and manage the system.
confirmations.confirmMakeAdmin: I understand this user will have admin access
confirmations.makeAdminWarning: Admin users have elevated privileges and can manage other users and system settings.
confirmations.redirectToSettings: Redirect to settings to assign roles
confirmations.redirectToSettingsDesc: After granting admin access, redirect to the settings page to assign specific roles and permissions.
confirmations.mustConfirmMakeAdmin: You must confirm that you understand the implications of granting admin access
confirmations.removeAdminDescription: This will revoke admin access from {{email}}. The user will no longer be able to access the admin panel.
confirmations.removingAdminAccess: You are about to revoke admin access from {{email}}

userDetails.authProvidersDesc: Identity providers linked to this user
userDetails.mfaFactorsDesc: MFA factors configured for this user
